select id, code, name, pro_code, city_code, area_code, disease_code, oper_code, buli_image_path, address, phone, fax, email, post_code, hosp_image_path, introduce, website, legal_name, legal_phone, admin_name, admin_phone, level_code, pym, wbm, long_lat, start_date, end_date, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,audit_flag,audit_msg,service_status from center_hospital
( name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or pym like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or wbm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and NOT ((end_date <= #{start_time}) OR (#{end_time} <start_date))

and service_status=#{serviceStatus}
order by crte_time desc
